content.title: Python-based Web Scraping for RuneScape Game Data
content.description: Developed a set of Python scripts to efficiently scrape and process game information from RuneScape, including over 4000 item icons and wiki page content. This project showcases advanced web scraping techniques, data processing, and preparation for future applications. The scraped data serves as a foundation for other projects, including a flipping calculator for in-game investments. The scripts handle large-scale icon downloads with rate limiting and transform complex HTML content into structured markdown format, facilitating future AI training.

infoBoxes.title: Key Features
infoBoxes.content: Large-scale icon scraping, HTML content parsing, Data structuring for AI training

infoBoxes.title: Rate Limiting
infoBoxes.content: Implemented 1 request per second to avoid overloading servers

infoBoxes.title: Related Projects
infoBoxes.content: Foundation for a RuneScape flipping calculator

items.text: This video demonstrates the web scraping scripts in action, showcasing the process of downloading game icons and parsing HTML content from RuneScape wiki pages for future use in projects and AI training.
